<h3 id="X31732">X(31732) = CENTER OF THE ORTHOPOLAR CIRCLE OF THESE TRIANGLES: CIRCUMORTHIC AND 2nd CIRCUMPERP</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^2*((b^2+c^2)*a^6-3*(b^4+c^4)*a^4-(b+c)*b^2*c^2*a^3+(3*b^4+3*c^4-(6*b^2-7*b*c+6*c^2)*b*c)*(b+c)^2*a^2+(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*b^2*c^2*a-(b^6-c^6)*(b^2-c^2))  :  :

<br>
<b>X(31732) = X(40)-3*X(5890) = 3*X(51)-2*X(19925) = 3*X(165)-5*X(10574) = X(355)-3*X(568) = 3*X(568)-2*X(31760) = 2*X(1216)-3*X(10165) = 5*X(1698)-7*X(15043) = 3*X(1699)-X(12111) = 3*X(2979)-5*X(7987) = 3*X(3060)-X(5691) = 5*X(3567)-3*X(5587) = 3*X(3576)-X(11412) = 7*X(3624)-5*X(11444) = 3*X(3817)-2*X(5907) = 2*X(3828)-3*X(16226) = 4*X(5462)-3*X(10175) = X(5493)-4*X(13382) = 9*X(5640)-7*X(7989) = 2*X(5777)-3*X(15049) = 3*X(5886)-X(18436) = 3*X(5886)-2*X(31751)</b>
<p>
For these triangles the orthopoles are concident.</p>
<p>X(31732) lies on these lines:
{1,5889}, {2,31752}, {3,31737}, {4,31757}, {10,389}, {40,5890}, {51,19925}, {52,515}, {103,29091}, {143,18480}, {165,10574}, {185,516}, {355,568}, {511,4297}, {517,6102}, {519,14831}, {573,2304}, {946,12259}, {1125,5562}, {1154,1385}, {1216,10165}, {1614,9625}, {1698,15043}, {1699,12111}, {2772,12688}, {2779,24474}, {2781,12262}, {2807,4301}, {2818,4084}, {2979,7987}, {3060,5691}, {3567,5587}, {3576,11412}, {3579,13630}, {3624,11444}, {3817,5907}, {3828,16226}, {5446,31673}, {5462,10175}, {5493,13382}, {5640,7989}, {5663,22793}, {5777,15049}, {5847,19161}, {5876,9955}, {5886,18436}, {5946,9956}, {6101,13624}, {6243,18481}, {6684,9730}, {7503,16472}, {7592,15177}, {7988,15056}, {8227,11459}, {9586,11449}, {9611,11461}, {9622,11464}, {9729,10164}, {9781,18492}, {10263,28160}, {10575,28150}, {10627,17502}, {10628,13605}, {11230,11591}, {11231,12006}, {11365,12164}, {11793,19862}, {12162,18483}, {12239,13883}, {12240,13936}, {12571,15030}, {12675,23156}, {13491,28146}, {14449,28186}, {15045,31423}, {16192,20791}, {16881,18357}, {16980,28236}</p>
<p>
X(31732) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1, 5889}, {6243, 18481}<br>
X(31732) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (4, 31757), (10, 389), (355, 31760), (3579, 13630), (5562, 1125), (5876, 9955), (6101, 13624), (12162, 18483), (18357, 16881), (18436, 31751), (18480, 143), (23156, 12675), (31673, 5446), (31728, 6102), (31737, 3), (31738, 1385)<br>
X(31732) = anticomplement of X(31752)<br>
X(31732) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (355, 568, 31760), (5886, 18436, 31751)<br>
</p>
